effect.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance of inflcting either paralysis, poison, or sleep on attacking Pokémon on contact.
effect.full: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being paralyzed, poisoned, or put to sleep, chosen at random. Nothing is done to compensate if the move's user is immune to one of these ailments; there is simply a lower chance that the move's user will be affected.

description.diamond-pearl: Contact may paralyze, poison, or cause sleep.
description.platinum: Contact may paralyze, poison, or cause sleep.
description.heartgold-soulsilver: Contact may paralyze, poison, or cause sleep.
description.black-white: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.
description.black-2-white-2: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.
description.x-y: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.
description.sun-moon: Contact with the Pokémon may inflict poison, sleep, or paralysis on its attacker.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Contact with the Pokémon may inflict poison, sleep, or paralysis on its attacker.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Contact with the Pokémon may inflict poison, sleep, or paralysis on its attacker.
description.sword-shield: Contact with the Pokémon may inflict poison, sleep, or paralysis on its attacker.
